default.title: Digital Profile System | Government of Nepal
default.description: Official Digital Profile Information System for citizens of Nepal

home.title: Home - buddhashanti Digital Profile System
home.description: Access government services online through the official buddhashanti Digital Profile Citizen Portal. Manage your documents, verify your identity, and access services securely.
home.keywords: buddhashanti, digital profile, citizen portal, nepal government, digital identity, online services, e-governance

profile.title: My Profile | Digital Profile System
profile.description: View and manage your personal information and verification status
profile.keywords: citizen profile, digital identity, buddhashanti profile, personal information, digital documents

register.title: Register | Digital Profile System
register.description: Register yourself in the Digital Profile Information System to access government services securely
register.keywords: citizen registration, new account, digital identity, buddhashanti registration, government services

login.title: Login | Digital Profile System
login.description: Sign in to your Digital Profile account to access government services and manage your digital identity
login.keywords: citizen login, secure access, buddhashanti login, government portal, digital services

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password - buddhashanti Digital Profile System
forgotPassword.description: Reset your password to regain access to your buddhashanti Digital Profile account and government services.
forgotPassword.keywords: password recovery, forgot password, account access, reset password, buddhashanti account

dashboard.title: Dashboard | Digital Profile System
dashboard.description: Manage your digital profile, upload documents, and track verification status
dashboard.keywords: citizen dashboard, service status, buddhashanti services, digital profile dashboard

documents.title: My Documents - buddhashanti Digital Profile System
documents.description: Manage your official documents in the buddhashanti Digital Profile System. Upload, update, and access your verified digital documents.
documents.keywords: digital documents, citizenship documents, official papers, document management, buddhashanti documents

services.title: Services - buddhashanti Digital Profile System
services.description: Explore and access government services available through the buddhashanti Digital Profile System.
services.keywords: government services, online services, e-governance, public services, buddhashanti services

registrationSuccess.title: Registration Successful | Digital Profile System
registrationSuccess.description: Your registration with the Digital Profile Information System has been received. Follow the next steps to complete your profile verification.
